name: Try it - Links
title: Try it - Links
body:

Environments

37

Development / POC

Description: Could be broken at any point in time, used for testing, used for development, Dev and QA are owners

Admin Console: https://questback-poc-admin.oktapreview.com

User Login: https://questback-poc.oktapreview.com (Okta Domain)

User Login : https://okta.testback.com/ (Custom Domain)

Test Login with Redirect to localhost (copy paste, customize if needed):

https://okta.testback.com/oauth2/ausog0bep2mtm7gKd0h7/v1/authorize?client_id=0oanh7c23i60WxQLx0h7&nonce=AYx1j79hkGTnJ7FlOIMqh2teti9ee0i9sCwePnJuLqR55QxUqHw1yieGn30taqfY&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%2Fiam%2Fadmin%2Fauth%2Flogin&response_mode=fragment&response_type=code&state=p7bKuF4UcgnzQzaKToq2NTiUNopca89uMWPzTROVJbnNluyC5ekgfTNAZuYZ5GhH&scope=openid%20email%20profile

Current Production

Description: User facing envrinoment. Production clients are on it. 2nd level support ( ) is owner of this environment

Admin Console: https://questback-admin.okta.com

User Login: https://questback.okta.com (Okta Domain)

User Login: https://access.questback.com (Custom Domain)

Deprecated Tivian Account

Description: A first attempt to setup a tivian.com production environment. This was discontinued by Kamil and Thomas B. The owners are Dev and QA for now. This account can just be left as is as long as nothing happens on that front.

Admin Console: https://tivian-admin.okta.com/
